meeting_annotations.transcript: I think one of the ways in which, like, at least the computational community can police itself in terms of whether we are predicting the properties correctly or not. So if I, like, if I'm looking at a molecular system, for example, if I tweak the electrophilicity of one particular group at one end, I have some intuition about how that would impact the resulting kinetics.
